name: Out Of The Game
description:
An experiment on interactive storytelling. Explore interactive objects , puzzle up the pieces you find  and "escape" the room.

Control:

Zoom in the Specific Scene by scrolling on mouse.

Flip the poster and open the app by draging and click on the right mouse.

Find and click the objects by left mouse.

If you feel lost, don't worry. That's just part of the fun. Enjoy wondering in the room and looking for interactive objects. Try some interactives by  intuition and see what happen. Fill in the story with your understanding.  You are welcome to leave any feedbacks or criticisms below! Enjoy the game!
